sentences.english: I like dumplings with vegetables and pork better than any other kind.

sentences.english: Parents keep busy preparing the New Year's Eve dinner and making jiaozi—dumplings with meat and vegetable fillings.

sentences.english: I'm going to breakfast an egg-white omelet with vegetable and cheddar filling.

sentences.english: Patties made from minced human flesh were on sale at the Leningrad Haymarket .

sentences.english: Clara's family would have stuffed artichokes for the holidays.
